products.name: Sm Party Shoulder Bag, , - Silver
products.brandedName: Kurt Geiger Sm Party Shoulder Bag, , - Silver
products.description: The enchanting shoulder bag from the "SM PARTY" collection by KURT GEIGER epitomizes luxury and sophisticated style. Crafted from an exceptionally shimmering material reminiscent of precious crystals, it stands out as a unique accessory for evening attire. Its rectangular shape, with distinctly defined edges and adorned with tiny, silver elements, creates a striking quilted pattern, endowing the bag with an unparalleled character. Its uniqueness is further enhanced by the long, chain-link strap, allowing it to be worn over the shoulder, perfectly complementing the metallic aesthetic. At the forefront of the bag, serving as its focal point, is a decorative clasp with stones that mimic cut glass, further accentuating its exclusive nature. The interior of the bag, finished in a contrasting, dark material, conceals a practical compartment and a slip pocket, secured with magnetic snaps, ensuring the safety of stored items. WHY PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT? * DISTINCTIVE DESIGN: The quilted pattern and silver finishing give the bag a unique appearance. * LUXURIOUS DETAILS: The decorative clasp with stones adds sparkle and elegance. * COMFORT AND FUNCTIONALITY: The chain-link strap and practical interior with an additional pocket. * EXCLUSIVITY: The Kurt Geiger designer logo is synonymous with luxury and the highest quality.

products.name: Polka Dot Skirt, , - Black
products.brandedName: Dolce & Gabbana Polka Dot Skirt, , - Black
products.description: Captivating in its simplicity yet profoundly elegant, the POLKA DOT MIDI SKIRT from the esteemed fashion house DOLCE & GABBANA epitomizes style and class. Its classic color scheme, featuring a dominant black accented with white dots, creates a timeless pattern. This slightly flared, calf-length model accentuates femininity and adds a touch of breeziness to any ensemble. Crafted from HIGH-QUALITY, FLUID FABRIC, it assures a perfect drape over the figure while offering unparalleled comfort. A noteworthy subtle detail is the DISCREET DESIGNER LOGO placed on the fabric, serving as a hallmark of the brand. This skirt features no visible fastenings, a testament to its minimalist design - only a concealed zipper and hook at the back, allowing for easy tailoring to one's figure. WHY INVEST IN THIS PIECE? * An elegant, timeless polka dot pattern * High-quality, fluid fabric for supreme wearing comfort * A subtle designer logo adds an exclusive touch * Minimalist design with concealed fastening, accentuating the feminine silhouette * A product of the renowned DOLCE & GAMBIA brand, ensuring the highest quality of craftsmanship

products.name: Azure Vases James Dress
products.brandedName: Tuckernuck Azure Vases James Dress
products.description: Effortless, classy, and feminine, we love everything that the Azure Vases James Dress brings to the table. This maxi is cut in a relaxed silhouette that'll keep you cool and refreshed during the warmer months while still looking elevated and put-together. Plus, the side pockets are a great addition for when you need to stash your lipgloss and phone but don't want to carry a bulky clutch! Easy to dress up or down, we are pairing this show stopper with heels and gold accessories for date night, flats for showers, and white sneakers for a casual picnic with the gals. Crew neckline Short sleeves Back zip Side pockets Shift silhouette Maxi length Material: 97% Polyester, 3% Spandex Care: Dry clean only

products.name: Column Gown
products.brandedName: Mac Duggal Column Gown
products.description: Elevate your formal wardrobe with the stunning Mac Duggal Column Gown. This elegant white gown features an asymmetrical neckline, cold shoulder detailing, and intricate beading and sequins throughout for a touch of glamour. The floor-length design has a side slit for added drama and a center back zipper for easy wear. Made from 100% polyester, this gown is perfect for any special occasion. Spot clean only. Imported. Add this show-stopping piece to your collection today.

products.name: Valentino Garavani - Scalloped Wool And Silk-blend Cady Mini Dress - Blue
products.brandedName: Valentino Garavani Scalloped Wool And Silk-blend Cady Mini Dress - Blue
products.unbrandedName: Scalloped Wool And Silk-blend Cady Mini Dress - Blue
products.description: Valentino Garavani's mini dress detailed with logo-etched buttons and scalloped trims that add interest to the otherwise minimal style. Made in Italy from wool and silk-blend cady, it has a shift silhouette and smooth satin lining. Match your jewelry to the gleaming gold-tone embellishments.

products.name: Emilia Wickstead - Emmy Paneled Cloqué Mini Dress - Pink
products.brandedName: Emilia Wickstead Emmy Paneled Cloqué Mini Dress - Pink
products.unbrandedName: Emmy Paneled Cloqué Mini Dress - Pink
products.description: EXCLUSIVE AT NET-A-PORTER. Emilia Wickstead's 'Emmy' dress is just so pretty. Made from textural cloqué, it's cut in a classic shift shape and darted to define your figure. The square back brings an element of surprise when you turn.

products.name: Silk Neck Scarf
products.brandedName: COS Silk Neck Scarf
products.description: Introducing COS × TABATA SHIBORI, an exclusive collaboration of artworks by artisan Kazuki Tabata that honor the traditional craft of Japanese shibori. The captivating motif on this silk scarf is a result of the meticulous sekka technique which creates a vivid hand-dyed pattern in rich bronze and steel-blue hues. Its wide, triangular shape allows it to be styled in a number of ways - wear it as a neckerchief, bandeau or tied to the handle of a bag. Rolled edges Shell: 100% Silk. Excluding trims Length: 19.68", Width: 55.11"
